title: Stephen A. Smith Interview, MTH, Lottery, Ashanti Verzuz Keyshia Cole and more.
itunes:title: Stephen A. Smith Interview, MTH, Lottery, Ashanti Verzuz Keyshia Cole and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve and the crew are enjoying the new found normalcy and an interesting point about stupidity is made. Btw, shout out to those Bernie Sanders memes. A mommas boy writes in and The Chief Love Officer advises him about his living situation. Our family from ESPN's First Take stopped by to discuss his new show Stephen A's World, which debuted on 01/11/21. Fool #2 murders another one in the spirit of Chris Brown and Young Thug. The battle between Ashanti and Keyshia Cole took place and let's say Junior will date either one. LMBAO!!! One person in Maryland won the money and the crew are reflecting. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve reminds us that success is a decision away.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
